No:
Deskripsi Mata Kuliah (Course Description):
Mata kuliah Analisa Kegagalan merupakan pendekatan menyeluruh terkait faktor
penyebab kegagalan suatu sistem, jenis kegagalan, serta prosedur analisisnya.
Tujuan Pembelajaran (Course Objective):
Memberikan pengetahuan dan pemahaman tentang kekuatan bahan terhadap
berbagai pembebanan, efek pembebanan pada perpatahan dan kelelahan, keausan,
creep bahan, konsentrasi tegangan, crack growth dan prediksinya melalui kajian
analitis dan empiris (studi kasus).
Capaian Pembelajaran Lulusan (CPL) atau Student Outcomes (SO): A1, A3, dan B3
Materi Pembelajaran (Outline Syllabus):
Review kekuatan bahan (beban axial, geser, desak, torsi, momen lengkung, slope,
defleksi, beban kombinasi dan eksentrisitas, instabilitas tekuk). Jenis-jenis kegagalan,
Kondisi dan faktor penyebab kegagalan, Prosedur analisis kegagalan. Perpatahan dan
kelelahan bahan, keausan bahan, kurve S-N, creep bahan, konsentrasi tegangan,
crack growth dan prediksinya. Studi kasus; failure due to overloading, failure due to
cyclic loading, failure due to corrosion, creep failures, brittle fracture, failure due to
environmental attack, environmentally assisted cracking, bearing failures, multiaxial
fatigue of welded structures, high cycle multiaxial fatigue, non-proportional and
variable-amplitude loading, low cycle multiaxial fatigue, applications, and testing
methods
Metode Pembelajaran SCL yang dipilih (Methods of Delivery):
Case-based learning, Project-based learning
Metode Penilaian (Assessment Methods):
Tugas, Quiz, Project, UTS, UAS, Project.
Referensi (Reference):
1) Nishida, S. (2014). Failure Analysis in Engineering Applications. United
Kingdom: Elsevier Science.
2) McLeod, B. (2013). Handbook of Failure Analysis of Materials in Mechanical
Design: Identification, Prediction and Prevention. United Kingdom:
Unknown Publisher.
3) ASM Handbook Volume 11: Failure Analysis and Prevention. (2021).
